summary: This is an email from attorney Bruce Barket to several recipients, including a Bureau of Prisons email address, regarding a client named Mr. Tartaglione. Barket seeks to discuss conditions under which Tartaglione would withdraw his request to be moved from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC).

persons.name: Bruce Barket
persons.context: Attorney sending an email regarding his client, Mr. Tartaglione, and his conditions at MCC. He is a partner at Barket Epstein Kearon Aldea & LoTurco, LLP.

persons.name: Jason Swergold
persons.context: Primary recipient of the email, addressed with a SANYS suffix suggesting a legal or state-affiliated role.

persons.name: Adam Johnson
persons.context: Named as a recipient of the email.

persons.name: Stephanie Scannell
persons.context: Recipient with an email address at bop.gov, indicating she is a Bureau of Prisons employee.

persons.name: Aida Leisenring
persons.context: CC'd on the email, with an email address at the law firm barketepstein.com.

persons.name: Mr. Tartaglione
persons.context: The client of Bruce Barket who has requested to be moved from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC). The email seeks to discuss conditions for withdrawing that request.

connections.description: Bruce Barket is the attorney representing Mr. Tartaglione regarding his incarceration conditions at MCC.
Aida Leisenring is CC'd on the email from Bruce Barket and has an email at his law firm's domain.
Barket is emailing Scannell, a Bureau of Prisons employee, regarding his client's incarceration.

events.title: Government's Letter to the Court
events.description: The Government sent a letter to the Court, referenced as a prior event that this email is following up on.

events.title: Email Regarding Tartaglione's MCC Transfer Request
events.description: Bruce Barket sends an email seeking to discuss conditions under which his client, Mr. Tartaglione, would withdraw his request to be moved from MCC.

locations: Garden City, NY 11530 (Law firm address: 666 Old Country Road, Ste. 700)
keyFacts: Attorney Bruce Barket represents an inmate named Mr. Tartaglione who is held at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC).
Tartaglione has made a request to be moved from MCC, and Barket is seeking to negotiate conditions under which that request would be withdrawn.
The email is addressed to a Bureau of Prisons employee (Stephanie Scannell) and other parties, indicating official discussions about inmate conditions.
The law firm involved is 'Barket Epstein Kearon Aldea & LoTurco, LLP', which includes 'Epstein' in its name, linking it to the broader Epstein case context.
The communication is marked as potentially confidential attorney-client privileged information.
